## function_createProgressbar
> **createProgressbar**(`config`?): [`ProgressbarWidget`](#progressbarwidget)

Defined in: [core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts:122](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts#L122)

Create an ProgressbarWidget with given config props

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)\>

an optional progress bar config

### Returns

[`ProgressbarWidget`](#progressbarwidget)

an ProgressbarWidget

## interface_ProgressbarDirectives
Defined in: [core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts:39](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts#L39)

Interface representing directives for a progress bar component.

### Properties

#### ariaDirective

> **ariaDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts:43](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/progressbar/progressbar.ts#L43)

A directive to be applied to the main container that handles aria attributes.

## interface_ProgressbarProps

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`value`, `minimum`, `maximum`) => `undefined` \| `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

###### value

`number`

current value

###### minimum

`number`

minimum value

###### maximum

`number`

maximum value

##### Returns

`undefined` \| `string`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => undefined
```

***

## type alias_ProgressbarWidget
